scales.name: Dorian
scales.description: Mode II: minor scale with a raised 6. D-C

scales.name: Dorian b5
scales.description: Second mode of the harmonic major scale.

scales.name: Dorian #4

scales.name: Phrygian

scales.description: Mode V: major scale with a lowered 7. G-F

scales.name: Aeolian
scales.description: Mode VI: natural minor scale. A-G

scales.name: Locrian
scales.description: Mode VII: minor scale with a lowered 2 and 5. B-A
